EmailTemplate.name: IPM Notify Finance Leader about TLD is changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Attention Target Launch Date is changed for {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The Target Launch Date for {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} has been updated to {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Target_Launch_Dates__c} from {!IPM_Project__c.Previous_Target_Launch_Date__c}.
